span.p: See our School Closure Update page with FAQs by clicking HERE.

In accordance with Governor Kemp’s guidance and to ensure student and staff safety, all schools in the Lee County School System will remain closed to in-person learning through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. We are still planning to do teaching and learning in a non-traditional sense, much like we have been doing. We know that this raises questions, however, and our leadership will begin discussions on this as soon as possible.
All Board of Education meetings are advertised in advance and publicized through local media and the school system web site.

span.p: To obtain a work permit, go to www.dol.state.ga.us. Instructions for completing the form are here

Our counselors have many resources on their webpage, and one of the best is their list of scholarships available to LCHS students. Be sure to visit the page which is updated as new scholarship opportunities become available.
